editorialSummary.text: Straightforward hotel offering relaxed rooms with free Wi-Fi, plus a restaurant & a 24-hour gym.

originalText.text: I was so impressed by this location - upon check in we were greeted by a young man who struck up plenty of conversation and made us feel very welcomed. Throughout our stay, we interacted with multiple front desk staff who never hesitated to give us directions or recommendations … all made us feel welcome. Our room was extremely clean. Our flight out wasn’t until 9:00pm, they happily accommodated holding our bags so we could enjoy the city. The location was extremely convenient to Times Square and Pennsylvania station. The breakfast options were great. Lastly, they require a room card to enter 24/7 which made us feel very safe. This will be our hotel of choice every time we visit the city!

text.text: I was so impressed by this location - upon check in we were greeted by a young man who struck up plenty of conversation and made us feel very welcomed. originalText.text: First time staying here and I was very impressed. Customer service was great. I felt safe because you need your hotel room key to access upper floors in the hotel. Our room was on the 20th floor. The room was a decent size with a very comfortable king sized bed. The room and bathroom were both clean. My daughter and I were here for Christmas weekend and we had a great time. The hotel is in close proximity to Bryant Park, Central Park, Penn Station, Madison Square Garden, Times Square & Rockefeller Center as well as various coffee shops and eateries. There is a small market on the main floor but not a lot of options. Same goes for the cafe inside the hotel. That’s not a big deal due to having so many options nearby. My only complaint is the noise level. You can hear conversations in the hallway very loudly. There was some outside traffic noise as well. The hotel room doors are also very loud and don’t close softly.  Instead they slam shut which made it difficult to get a good nights sleep. Overall we had a pleasant stay and I would consider staying there again.

originalText.text: Wow, what a fantastic hotel! The prices are reasonable, the rooms are spotless, and the location is unbeatable. Every single staff member was incredibly friendly and excels at their job. I have to give a special shout out to Aaron Whitening for his amazing customer service. Without a doubt, I would highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a great hotel experience.

text.text: Wow, what a fantastic hotel! The prices are reasonable, the rooms are spotless, and the location is unbeatable. Every single staff member was incredibly friendly and excels at their job. I have to give a special shout out to Aaron Whitening for his amazing customer service. Without a doubt, I would highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a great hotel experience.

originalText.text: Stayed here for Veterans Weekend. Location was great. Close to everything. Rooms were a little smaller than other Courtyards I stayed at previously but I'm guessing it's due to being so close to Times Square and the middle of everything. They have an excellent staff that's polite, friendly and very helpful. Gerardine at the front desk checked me in quickly (even though I was a few hours early) and answered any questions I had. The concierge was polite and responsible when handling my luggage which was stored for a few hours. I also liked that it was required to have a room key to access the lobby from the outside. If guests hasn't checked in yet, the concierge or front desk will open it for you. Makes you feel safer in the middle of a busy city.

originalText.text: This hotel is in a great location. Walkable to central park for a morning walk. Walkable to Times Square. Great restaurants all around it. There are a few complaints I’ve read about the rooms or bathroom. I get that, but it’s not bad at all, this is a strong 3 star hotel. The staff nearly make it a 4 star for me, they were all so nice and helpful. Me and my daughter had an amazing birthday weekend here. Breakfast is totally adequate, complimentary coffee is good, Starbucks right there if you need different. I don’t have any complaints, we had a great stay.
